package_info.mp_subtitle: The module that brings you page's edition and plugins to create and administrate your website.
package_info.mp_description:
MelisCms is the website manager of Melis Platform.
It will bring everything needed to create and manage a website:
- a treeview of pages to have a easy view on all pages, combined with a quick page search tool
- a fully wysiwyg templating system, where the page is displayed just as what people see online
- a plugin system to create pages from scratch and make it available to non technical persons
- a SEO management system to deal with URLs
- a language tool to associate same pages in different languages versions
- a tool to declare a website, its domain, its homepage, its 404
- a tool to deal with 301 links and any redirection, ideal when migrating a website
- a tool to declare templates and stylesheets
- a tool to create new languages for the front-office
- a tool that enable page Ids management per platform, so that Ids are different from one environment to another and production deployment easier
